job.title: DevOps Engineer-Cryptoassets
job.description: <p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>Participate in designing and supporting highly available systems</li><li>Continue to push efforts for building out infra on Kubernetes</li><li>Continue to enhance monitoring infra using Prometheus, Grafana, Alerta and Splunk</li><li>Enhance CI/CD processes leveraging declarative configuration tools like Concourse</li><li>Help create easily repeatable patterns for local development to migrate to production</li><li>Manage large amounts of data on varying types of storage</li><li>Support and enhance highly available database architecture</li><li>Build and enhance tooling used by the DevOps team</li><li>Research and implement new technologies</li><li>Consistently challenge the norm and advocate for change</li></ul><p><strong>Required Skills and Experience</strong></p><ul><li>Prior experience supporting mission critical, high performance applications</li><li>Deploying and supporting applications in Kubernetes</li><li>Monitoring applications using Prometheus and Grafana</li><li>Developed CI/CD pipelines for Kubernetes deployments</li><li>Solid Python experience</li><li>Postgres support for highly available systems</li><li>Previous Linux platform support experience</li><li>Basic knowledge of TLS</li><li>Demonstrated knowledge of network communications experience, including multicast and websockets</li><li>Flexibility to take off-hours support calls as needs dictate</li><li>Experience using ansible to manage infrastructure</li></ul><p><strong>Desired Personal Characteristics:</strong></p><ul><li>Ability to learn quickly; a passion for new technology</li><li>Self-motivated to continually expand skillset and improve supported systems</li><li>Demonstrated high level of ownership and accountability</li><li>Ability to handle pressure and time constraints with composure</li><li>Strong organizational skills, including planning, prioritization, and documentation</li></ul><li></li>
